about_the_game:
Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge. It brings out all that is best and it removes all that is base. – George S Patton

Star Realms - Command contains another set of 12 all-new cards with the new multi-faction ships and bases. When the colonies go to war, which factions will untie to overcome the odds and emerge as survivors?

This pack contains 12 cards: 2 Trade Star, 1 Union Stronghold, 2 Alliance Transport, 1 Embassy Base, 2 Coalition Messenger, 1 Lookout Post, 2 Blob Bot, 1 Exchange Point.
detailed_description:
Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge. It brings out all that is best and it removes all that is base. – George S Patton

Star Realms - Command contains another set of 12 all-new cards with the new multi-faction ships and bases. When the colonies go to war, which factions will untie to overcome the odds and emerge as survivors?

This pack contains 12 cards: 2 Trade Star, 1 Union Stronghold, 2 Alliance Transport, 1 Embassy Base, 2 Coalition Messenger, 1 Lookout Post, 2 Blob Bot, 1 Exchange Point.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.

name: Star Realms - Command

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.

short_description: This expansion contains 12 cards that you can use in online play, versus the AI or a friend, or in the 13th Chapter of the campaign.
